thread.section_title: Thread Logic Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thread Logic | threadlogic.com
thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: It is easy to order on line. The merchandise arrives on time and is always correct. The only issue I would say could take a bit more time and concentration is consistency with item numbers. Sometimes if ordering an item that has been ordered previously, but not recently, it may take a bit more time to make sure that the item being ordered is the exact same item as previously ordered. This issue is not such an issue that it would cause any hesitation whatsoever in recommending Thread Logic.
